meaning: A wise person should behave like an ignorant one — humility is key.
Even a stormy sea appears calm — appearances can be deceiving.
Never refuse to offer food — feeding the hungry is a noble deed.
Desire to do righteous acts — virtue is the greatest wealth.
Walk the proven path — follow the footsteps of the wise.
Act with awareness — think before you do anything.
Where water flows, greenery grows — nurturing leads to prosperity.

proverb: ஊருக்கே நல்லது செய்தால் உனக்கே நல்லது நடக்கும்
transliteration: Ūrukku nalladhu seydhāl unakkē nalladhu nadakkum
meaning: If you do good for the community, good things will happen to you.
Words said in the morning may prove useful in the evening — never ignore good advice.
When the fruit ripens, it must be picked — strike when the time is right.
If done with planning and thought, even big tasks become easy.
Don’t just speak like others — speak wisely, not blindly.
With effort comes reward — nothing comes without trying.
When anger arises, foolishness follows.
Even a small resource should be shared wisely.
If it’s not useful to society, it’s not useful to the individual.
What is destined may not reach your hands — fate isn’t always fair.
One must carry their own responsibility — don’t expect others to help always.
Even if the ruler changes, people’s greed doesn’t.
One who lacks gratitude is destined for misery.
A house that waits for water will end up with empty vessels — don’t wait too long for essentials.
When the loom moves, the livelihood grows — work brings prosperity.
Even a rough stone can melt — kindness can change anyone.
God becomes a friend to those who are honest.
Saying 'enough' is a bad habit — it limits growth.

proverb: எண்ணமும் செயலும் ஒரே பாதையில் நடக்க வேண்டும்
transliteration: Eṇṇamum seyalum orē pāthaiyil naṭakka vēṇḍum
meaning: Your thoughts and actions should walk the same path — be truthful.
Get used to the politics in every meal — be wise to survival.
Fearlessness is the key to success.
Sowing a palm tree in the rainy season is useless — timing is everything.

proverb: நீர் இல்லாத இடத்தில் நத்தை கூட வாழாது
transliteration: Nīr illātha iṭaththil natthai kūḍa vāḻādhu
meaning: Even a snail can't survive without water — basic needs are essential for life.
